verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nityamu niluchunadi devuni vakyamu Satyamai yunnadi sarvamu cheyunadi 2{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Andhakaramunu tholaginchu jyothi adi Prathi manishini veliginchu mahima velugu adi } 2 Velighinchunu nadipinchunu throvaku deepamai Aa Velugu vakyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yendina edarilo neeti ootavantidi Vadiga pravahinchu jeevanadiye adi } 2 Dappigonina prathi jeevi dappika theerchunadi 2 Aa jeeva jalavakyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Apavadini anachivese aathmakhadgamadi Rendanchulu vadigaladai vadhinchunu vairulanu } 2 Odinchunu vidipinchunu thodai yellappudu 2 Aa shakthigala vakyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Poradumu yesukai manchi sainikuniga Shramalanu bharinchumu vakyamulo balamondi } 2 Thana ishwaryamulo theerchunu nee prathi avasaramu 2 Aa devadi devudu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nithyudagu devudu thwaraga vatchuchunnadu Jayinchu varinella thanatho konipovunu } 2 Thana vakyamunandu vardhilluchu vijayudavai yundumu 2 Prabhukorakai kanipettumu Halleluya halleluya halleluya halleluya 2{/lang-eng}
